attributes.action: Get Liz Truss out of the position of Prime minister
attributes.additional_details: Because she doesn't have a clue how to run the country or her cabinet. She has to go before she ruins the country
attributes.background: Remove Liz Truss from her position as Prime minister

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
